holy.name: Unmatched Power of the Sun
holy.description: You call upon the radiant fury of the divine sun, unleashing a wave of purifying energy that scorches the battlefield. This ultimate skill banishes all forms of darkness and inflicts grievous wounds upon the dark.

holy.name: Helios' Death
holy.description: A forbidden art used only in direst need. Helios sacrifices a fragment of his brilliance to grant a fleeting moment of life renewed. Use it wisely, for the sun cannot burn forever.

holy.name: Helios' Touch
holy.description: A touch imbued with the sun's life-giving energy, a reminder of Helios' watchful gaze.

holy.name: Divine Whip
holy.description: Wrought from pure divine energy, the whip crackles with righteousness. With each strike, it cleaves through darkness, delivering sanctified justice with unwavering resolve.
